values:
i just found out a kid from school died last night, he was the year below me, but 2 years younger, he was 12 and he had lukemia, he'd been fighting it for a year, and i never talked to him at school, i dont think i ever really had a coversation with him even though i went to primary school with him too, but its made me think...

no-one should die that young, he hasn't been through anything hasnt had a chance to live, to learn, to experience life, i feel sorry for him, and his family, and it'll mean nothing to them because i never spoke to them, but this is just so that people know im not a heartless bitch and that i care, for his family and friends, and that i feel for them

R.I.P Richard x

so, ive been on a cruise round the med for a week now, i feel like shit, tonight is my last nite the last few days have pretty much been a drunken blur.... but hey tonights the last day gota go out in style right? =) 

i feel like shit cos iim still with ben, or we're back together or in whatever state it was i posted last i dont remember, but we're together and i thought id be happy, but im not. He doesnt trust me and rightly so, i fuck him about and i lie to him and im too young and immature and too un aware of everyone elses feelings to be in a "serious" relationship, and when i was laid in bed the other night i tried looking at our relationship from someone elses point of veiw and its gona look dodgy as fuck, hes 6 years older than me 14 year olds and 20 years olds shouldnt be dating right?? 

God my heads all screwed up and i dont know wether its my hangover, my head or my heart talking. but im not happy anymore, and he keeps texting me or emailing me or calling me all the time telling me how im the only thing to keep him going and how much he loves me and im suffocationg, hes crushing me and most of all hes pushing me away from him by saying this. 

But i cant tell him because it'd crush him, i know i mean the world to him, and he did to me before, but i cant keep doing this, he lives in london i live in sheffield for a start. seriously 230 odd miles away. its fucking stupid. 

teenage angst. I know. i need someone to talk to.

ok so today i got a spangly new computer because mine broke and ok its not spangly new its my mumns old one hehe but itd mine now MINE MINE MINE i tells ya.. yea im kinde hyper.... singledom's cool yea ^_^ and tomorrow im going to norfolk (like other side of england) which is kinda dodgy but hey my parents are mmaking me :@ twats :@ grr never mind yea thats about all i have to say for now... toodle pip x

argh my god ive not updated for aaages, ok so whats happened?? um um um last time i posted i think i was with eddie, but we split up like a month ago then i as back with my ex, ben, an then we split up an then on monday i got back together with my ex from 2 years ago - Ian an its like grr cos ive not seen him since an i dont think he's really interested in me which sucks, but hey lifes a bitch

yea an ummm umm amy my niece is still uber cute an gorgeous and um um thats about all, oh an i started my new year at school today which was shit but yea wow my life's so boring i might just go die now :(

firstly - Rebekah it said PIERCED on the 21st's post :P :$  mummy found out *whoops* then again she didnt seem to mind *sigh* oh im o confused i ended stuff with ben cos he's been ignoring me since wednesday an i dont know what i did wrong and he still hasnt talked to me i just texted him this morning saying "ok ben, you play your games, I'll play mine. We're over" short and sweet... but then again its good i split with him cos i started going out with eddy yesterday ^_^ *sigh* i hope i dotn fuck this up :( i hate living at home so much cant wait till i can leave ... soon i will... one day *counts days until 16th b-day* :( ta-ta for now peeps..

If i knew how to post a picture on here i would, my little nice Amy-Rose arrived at 6:15pm on saturday :) im so happy she was 2 weeks late (lazy girl!) and weighed 8lb 4oz (lay off the pies honey) hehe she's so gorgeous, she's so cute i held her for the first time last night while she was asleep and it was just like awww!!! hehe ^_^ shes so cute!! oh an am getting my hair cut tonight, short and bleached *woo* the its goin pink hehehe im so cool oh oh oh and on saturday i got my belly button pierced as well YAY!!! but my mum n dad dont know yet (heheh oops) lol anyway i gota go work now... how do i make a database again....?? lol ^_^

ugh im so confused :( i'm with ben again we're so on and off, and im sposed to be going to london to see him, but hes not even spoken to me in like a week an its so confusin an im sposed to b sein iain tomorrow but i duno if he still wants to meet up an its jut ugh i wish i was single. its alot less confusin!!

im so fucked off me an ben are split up, adam proposed to me, an i really like iain (ex from last year) is all so fuckin confusing. i hate this *sigh*  and schools shit ive been put in isolation :@ bastards i cant fucking wait till i can get away from this fucking city i hate it so much i cant breathe here i feel like im being suffocated by my friends and family, the people im closest to i want to be furthest away from. ugh i hate this + ive been put back on Xanax and Prozac cos im psycho lol hahah ah well fuck it i dont give a shit anymore

ugh i need to start writing more often i keep forgettin :'( (sorry jillian!!) ugh everythins gone from bad to worse lately its pretty shit really *sigh* i'm tryin to sort stuff out an my heads so messed up an i hate it :( im gona go cry :( nite all x
nygh am so bored + confused argh lol not good
OH an me an afformentioned adam (bf from october-november) an me are talkin again we talked for hours the other night about everything ^_^

oh my god im so bored.. i've not written in here in ages update :: me an ben are back together + really happy ^_^ muchos good... all other guys are un-important atm except dave who's a good fuck lol.. *ahem* stretched my ears up to 14 mm ^_^ muchos good hehe i love my peircings lol ah well thats all for now iwll write more soon .. love u jillian ^_^ xx

I'm so fucking sick of peopel screwing me over, i kno upto now i've written mainly bout lads an shit, an there's a lot more to me than that, i've been through way too much fucked up shit an i hate it, an i'm fed up of blokes screwing me over, firstly last summer there was aaron, he was 18 i was 13 an he lives like a million miles away (in newcastle bout 200 miles away) an i lost my virginity to him, an like a month after he was like "oh yea theres this other lass i've been going with i dont want to be your boyfriend anymore" i was completely heartbroken, i was like shit man, i'm never lettin anyone get to me like that again, i'm never going to fall in love again..
 
 then after that i went out with Adam in like october-end of november during which time i nearly got back together with my first bf from when i was 11 another adam, but that never happened and is still confusing to this day, anyway i slept with adam, an he was completely in love with me, but i knew that i was going to end up falling in love with him and so i pushed him away because i didnt want to be hurt again. so we split up an that was a messy break up so much so we still arnt on speaking terms :( 

 but durin the time i was goin out with adam i was talkin to this guy, Ben an we really hit it off, but a few people i knew had said he was really cocky an was a complete arse, but i was like hey what the fuck i really like this guy hes sweet an amazing an lovely an everythin, but then i went an dissed him big style on a message site so he didnt talk to me for ages, then one day out of the blue we start talkin an hes like "i know why i said it before when i told you i loved you" an that was it an we were goin out then i'd occasionally been freaking out cos im not very good at serious relationships after Aaron, an its like he put up with it an i could really talk to him an stuff, jus little things like hes one of the few people whos seen and heard me cry, but then its jus we keep getting into blazing arguments and i really dont want to fall in love because ill be hurt and thats exactly whats happened, hes finished me cos it isnt working anymore, and i dont want to argue with him, because if i just accept it it hurts less right? wrong. this is fucking killing me i hate him.
well i'm officially destined to be single, quite a few of my mates today told me they absolutly hate my bf :( plus he freaked out again i dont think we're goin to last :( this sucks i hate it

omg I'm in love with ben shit my head's fucked! I'm like actually, head-over-heels crazyly in love with him, like the people i take the piss out of, lol argh!! so confusing but now i don't know how he feels about me :(

argh my god i havent been on for a while lol.. so confused i dunno whats happenin atm got my sats next week >=[ eeevil.... i cant do maths im so crap lol argh!!! i dunno whats happenin with me an ben the recent ex, i think we're sort of back together but im not sure so confusing lol argh jillian where are you?!?! my stretches have gone up to 12 mm on each side =D an im startin a second stretch on my left ear but thats yet to go above 1.6mm hehe anyway .. more soon

here i am in i.t and im sooo bored!!! the only good part of this lesson is the teacher yum yum.. lol i saw steve again yesterday an he kept hugging me an stuff an i was like "dont you think the age thing's a bit weird?" cos hes like 21 an im 14 an he was like "not really, i like u an ur really mature an stuff" an i really dont know but he's raelly fit an sutff, but the only problem was that when he was talkin to his mates all they were talkin about was drugs an i dont use drugs at all an so i dunno =S!! jillian... help me!!!

ok so this weekend was pretty sucky, i got dumped then i got hit on then i get confused an stuff, last night there was major arguing with the ex bf an he was sayin all this stuff like he never really cared an shit an i got really wound up an my sister was yelling at me 2 get off the net an i was like :'( an it was all crap an now ive got my house 2 myself and im bored and horny and its not fair *sigh* this weekend's been shit :(

ok, so yesterday sucked... Major dumpage :[ but today i was in town and serious sex god starts talkin to me, apparently i got off with him last summer (muchos drunkness) an hes called steve an he's oh so fit!!! i was like drooling all over him, but wow!!! seriously!! omg, but then im weirded out because i only splitt up with the bf of bout 8 months on-off last nite an i'm like O_o argh im a spaz an its all confusing, but hes so fit an he keeps textin me telling me 2 meet up with him tomorrow an its like ^_^ oh my god... sex god texting me... ME!!!! heheheh YAY!!! wow im so happy and hyper and wow!! yay!! sooo fit fit fit, but then scary nick was tryin to get me to go back 2 his house, an steve was like "hey man back off my bird" an nick was like "omg ur goin out with HANNAH? u do kno shes a slapper rite?" an so steve punched him an i was like :O!!! omg... wow wow wow he hit sumone cos of me... i felt all special an yay!!! hehe anyway thats bout it for today.. dont think i did anythin really worth writin about... as per usual... life goes on... ^_^

so its official my life sucks... Ben (previously mentioned bf) jus finished me cos "it isnt working" how lame?? *sigh* an then i have this friend Joe, who live lives in america somewhere (i live in england) an he's like a guy who i talk to about everythin serious. an he jus said hes not gona b on the net ne more. ever. at all after a few days cos he cant affod to keep the internet how gay? so now im bitchin at him an i feel crap cos he has much worse problems than me an im jus moanin an i hate it an my mum an dad want to move house so they'll get all stressed and i dont have any money an im grounded and ed kissed me the other day and im so confused cos he just emailed me saying he wouldnt want to go out with me, because hes moving to brighton and ARGH!! why do people mess with my head? it's so unfair!!

spanking you jillian for making my page prettyfull :D:D im all dumb and wouldn't have figured out how to do it for about a million years and would have got all pissed off an never done it hehe *muchos kisses for jillian*  heheh Jillian is so hot and she spiffied up my Live Journal and I'm going to have sweaty german sex with her now well.. if her mummy says its ok *_*

 so yes now i suppose i should say something about my day or about me or about something someone somewhere might find interesting to read at some point... but i dont know what to say argh!!! ill just sit here and bitch about my arse of a boyfriend whos being a complete cock today :'( my life's tragic but hey im happy, i have all day tomorrow in town so alcohol is highly likely to come into my possesion at some point HEHEHE YAY!! ... ROAR

my god.. i cant work this website... muchos dificult!!! pssh watch it be all weird.. and now i dont know what to write, i dont write for people usually... but loads of peopel have been pesterin me to start a live journal thing for months so i have :D:D:D:D im goood ^_^
